mainSequence.step: Admin requests to view settings list
List settings view sends request to SettingsController
SettingsController retrieves settings list from SettingsModel
SettingsModel returns settings list to SettingsController
SettingsController sends settings list result to list settings view
List settings view displays settings list to Admin
List settings view sends new settings data to SettingsController
SettingsModel returns save result to SettingsController
SettingsController sends updated settings list result to list settings view
List settings view displays updated settings list to Admin
